item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 26 Oct 2021
item.description:
1. OCaml MOOC, third edition
  2. Release of ocaml-sf/learn-ocaml:0.13.0
  3. First release of ~conan~, the detective to recognize your file
  4. Software Engineer Position at OCamlPro (France)
  5. New version of Try OCaml
  6. Well Typed Router (wtr, wtr-ppx) v3.0.0 released
  7. containers 3.6
  8. ocaml-annot for binary annotations
  9. shuttle v0.3.1 released
  10. Generating static and portable executables with OCaml
  11. "Parsing" terms into a well-typed representation: a GADT puzzle
